mapper.insert: insert into member(idx, id, pwd, email, name, tel, indate, point, stat) values(member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{name}, #{tel}, sysdate, 1000,1)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
select * from member where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
select stat from member where id=#{id}
select * from( select a.*,row_number() over(order by idx desc) rn from member a ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel} where idx = #{idx}
